title: The Age of plywood
brief_description: The manufacture and uses of plywood. Every stage in the manufacture of plywood, from the journey of the log from the forest, its peeling or slicing into veneer, and processing to various grades of plywood. The uses of plywood in homes, commercial buildings and building projects, for panelling, furniture, structural work, concrete formwork and boat building.
